Your |cFFFFFFbank|r |t42:42:EsoUI\Art\Icons\ServiceMapPins\servicepin_bank.dds|t stores |cFFFFFFitems|r for all of your characters to |cFFFFFFshare|r:
|cFFFFFFPress|r <<1>> to |cFFFFFFpurchase|r more bank space.
Use <<2>> and <<3>> to switch between |cFFFFFFwithdraw|r and |cFFFFFFdeposit|r. 

Crafting materials |cFFFFFFstored|r in your bank are pulled directly to you when crafting. |cFFFFFFYou do not need to carry them to a crafting station.|r

Your inventory houses all the |cFFFFFFEquipment|r, |cFFFFFFSupplies|r, |cFFFFFFConsumables|r, |cFFFFFFQuest Items|r, and |cFFFFFFCrafting Materials|r your character has accumulated throughout their journey.

|cFFFFFFPress|r <<1>> after selecting an item to |cFFFFFFequip|r or |cFFFFFFuse|r it.
|cFFFFFFPress|r <<2>> after selecting an item to view |cFFFFFFmore actions|r that are available.

|cFFFFFFSell|r your items at any |cFFFFFFVendor|r or |cFFFFFFTraveling Merchant|r, |cFFFFFFstore|r items in your |cFFFFFFaccount bank|r |t32:32:EsoUI/Art/Icons/GuildRanks/guild_rankIcon_misc09_large.dds|t, or |cFFFFFFpurchase|r backpack space from a |cFFFFFFPack Merchant|r |t32:32:EsoUI\Art\Icons\ServiceToolTipIcons\servicetooltipicon_bagvendor.dds|t.\n\nGet rid of items you don't need! |cFFFFFFPress|r <<1>>  after selecting an item, then choose |cFFFFFFDestroy|r to remove it permanently.

Use |cFFFFFFQuickslots|r to easily access |cFFFFFFpotions|r and |cFFFFFFother items|r. Navigate to your character's |cFFFFFFinventory|r,  then select |cFFFFFFSlottable Items|r|t32:32:EsoUI/Art/Tutorial/Gamepad/gp_emptyslot_over.dds|t. |cFFFFFFSelect|r an item and |cFFFFFFpress|r <<1>> to assign items to a desired |cFFFFFFQuickslot|r.

|cFFFFFFSelecting an Active Quickslot:|r
|cFFFFFFHold|r <<2>> to bring up your |cFFFFFFQuickslots|r. |cFFFFFFSelect|r the |cFFFFFFdesired item|r and |cFFFFFFrelease|r <<2>>.

|cFFFFFFUsing Quickslot Items:|r
|cFFFFFFPress|r <<2>> to |cFFFFFFuse|r the item in your |cFFFFFFQuickslot|r.

The |cFFFFFFQuest Journal|r contains all of your character's |cFFFFFFQuests|r|t32:32:EsoUI/Art/Tutorial/Gamepad/gp_notificationIcon_quest.dds|t.

|cFFFFFFQuest Tips: |r
You can |cFFFFFFchange|r your |cFFFFFFfocused quest|r while adventuring by |cFFFFFFpressing|r <<1>>. You can use the |cFFFFFFMap|r <<2>> to see where to perform your next task. 

You can |cFFFFFFabandon|r a |cFFFFFFquest|r in your |cFFFFFFQuest Journal|r by selecting it and  |cFFFFFFpressing|r <<3>>, then select |cFFFFFFAbandon|r from the list of options.

When your character has a |cFFFFFFmount|r set |cFFFFFFActive|r, they can take |cFFFFFFRiding Lessons|r provided by the |cFFFFFFStablemaster|r|t32:32:EsoUI\Art\Icons\ServiceMapPins\servicepin_stable.dds|t for a small amount of gold. 

|cFFFFFFSelect|r the |cFFFFFFdesired skill|r and |cFFFFFFpress|r <<1>> to increase it.

|cFFFFFFOne riding lesson|r will be offered by the |cFFFFFFStablemaster|r|t32:32:EsoUI\Art\Icons\ServiceMapPins\servicepin_stable.dds|t after each |c76BCC3daily reset|r, so don't forget to visit the stables daily.

|cFFFFFFSkill Lines|r allow you to |cFFFFFFcustomize|r your |cFFFFFFcombat style|r to fight the way you want. You can select |cFFFFFFAbilities|r to learn more about what they do. |cFFFFFFSelect|r an |cFFFFFFAbility|r and |cFFFFFFpress|r <<1>> to |cFFFFFFpurchase|r the |cFFFFFFAbility|r.

|cFFFFFFActive Abilities|r can be |cFFFFFFslotted|r in your |cFFFFFFAbility Bar|r and are fired by |cFFFFFFpressing|r <<2>><<3>><<4>><<5>><<6>>.

|cFFFFFFPassive Abilities|r are |cFFFFFFalways active|r, granting you their benefits at all times.

|cFFFFFFUltimate Abilities|r are the |cFFFFFFmost powerful abilities|r and can be fired by |cFFFFFFpressing|r <<7>>.

The |cFFFFFFability|r you |cFFFFFFpurchased|r has been added to the first slot of your |cFFFFFFAbility Bar|r. |cFFFFFFPress|r <<1>> to use the |cFFFFFFability|r.

Some chests and doors are locked. If you have a lockpick in your inventory, press <<1>> to attempt to pick them.

Move the |cFFFFFFlockpick|r over a |cFFFFFFpin|r and |cFFFFFFhold|r the <<2>> to attempt to |cFFFFFFset the pin|r. When the |cFFFFFFpin wiggles|r |cFFFFFFrelease|r <<2>> to |cFFFFFFset the pin|r in place. Set all pins before the timer runs out.

You can attempt to |cFFFFFFforce|r the lock by pressing <<3>>.

In your Antiquities Codex, you can see all of the Antiquities you can currently Scry for. You can also read the Lore entries for any Antiquities you've already unearthed.

To begin scrying for an Antiquity, find it in the "Scryable" section, hover over it with your mouse, and press |r<<1>>.

To open your Antiquities Codex in the future, open your Journal and navigate to the |t32:32:EsoUI/Art/TreeIcons/gamepad/GP_journal_tabIcon_antiquities.dds|t Antiquities tab.
